channel.title: Opinion on Andryo Marzuki

item.title: A Fond 'Good Riddance' to Cryptocurrency
item.description: Zero Sum Game Cryptocurrency had been hailed as a “revolutionary” new technology that would change the way we transact and store value. In reality, it has become a breeding ground for scams, fraud, and corruption.
